settings.question: 1. What is the “To My Son” Bracelet?
settings.answer: The To My Son bracelet is a sentimental keepsake designed for parents to gift their sons. It features an engraved message that symbolizes love, support, and pride, making it a perfect gift for milestones like birthdays, graduations, or just because.

settings.question: 2. What is the bracelet made of?
settings.answer: Our bracelets are crafted from high-quality, durable materials such as stainless steel, leather, and hypoallergenic metals. They are designed to last a lifetime while maintaining their style and quality.

settings.question: 3. Is the engraving customizable?
settings.answer: Currently, the bracelets come pre-engraved with a heartfelt message. This ensures the perfect wording and design for every gift. Customizable options may be available in the future.

settings.question: 4. How do I choose the right size?
settings.answer: Each bracelet comes with adjustable features to fit most wrist sizes comfortably. The product description on each page provides detailed measurements and fitting instructions to help you choose the best option.

settings.question: 5. Is the bracelet suitable for daily wear?
settings.answer: Yes! The To My Son bracelet is designed for everyday use. It is made from materials that resist tarnishing, scratches, and wear, so your son can cherish it daily without worry.

settings.question: 6. What if my son doesn’t like it?
settings.answer: We offer a hassle-free return policy to ensure complete satisfaction. If your son doesn’t love the bracelet, you can return it for a full refund or exchange—no questions asked.

settings.question: 7. How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Orders are typically processed and shipped within 1–2 business days and delivered to your home in 5-8 business days total in the US.

settings.question: 8. Does the bracelet come with a warranty?
settings.answer: Yes! All Awareness Avenue products come with a lifetime warranty, so you can shop with confidence knowing your gift is protected.

settings.question: 9. What occasions is the bracelet ideal for?
settings.answer:
The To My Son bracelet is perfect for any milestone or occasion, including:

  • Birthdays
  • Graduations
  • Holidays (like Christmas or Father’s Day)
  • Celebrating personal achievements
  • Everyday reminders of your love and support

settings.question: 10. Why should I buy from Awareness Avenue?
settings.answer: Awareness Avenue is trusted by over 250,000 customers for meaningful jewelry that makes an impact. With over 45,000 positive reviews, a lifetime warranty, and exceptional customer service, we’re committed to making every purchase special.

settings.question: 11. How can I care for the bracelet?
settings.answer:
To maintain its shine and quality:

  • Clean regularly with a soft cloth.
  • Avoid harsh chemicals or water exposure when possible.
  • Store in the provided jewelry box when not in use.
